item.title: ETL Extraction
item.description: EDW enterprise data warehouse RPM Retail price management REiM Retail Invoice Match ReSA Retail Sales Audit A View table is appended with V suffix at the end The extract process takes multiple types of db –> converts them to flatfiles –> flat files match the staging schema –> so they can be further processed as per required. Load job: From flat files to staging table –> process it( transformation and lookup) –> move to target table
